participant_1.background:
I wonder if my co worker likes me back.
i am a college student who is a full time working mom.
I was bullied for being overweight as a child.
I started a small business so I could spend more time with my family.
I don't care how I look, I'm just going to enjoy the concert with my friend.

participant_2.background:
I value the memories I've made with my friends and family.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.
My children are my only living family members.
i now live in new mexico.
I am looking for a partner who is willing to be a parent to my children.

content.text: Just got done with work, how was your day?
pretty good, I just moved into a new house and I'm pretty excited about it.
thats awesome! I moved into a new house last year and I loved it.
what was your favorite part of moving?
I loved getting to pick out all of the new furniture and decor, it made it feel like my own home.
that's a great idea! I'm not sure what I'm going to do with all the space.
you could always use it for a home theater or a game room!
thats a good idea! I'm a big movie buff so I might have to do that.
awesome! I'm sure it'll be a lot of fun.
yeah, I'm looking forward to it.
do you have any plans for the weekend?
not really, I'm just going to relax and enjoy my new home.
that sounds like a good plan. I'm going to go out with some friends, but I'm sure I'll be back to relax by the end of the night.
have fun! I'm sure you will.
